verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Here I am waiting
Abide in me I pray
Here I am longing
For you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hide me in your love
Lead me to my knees
May I know Jesus more and more

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come live in me
All my life take over
Come breath in me
I will rise on eagle's wings
(repeat)
